trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Great Falls
There were no other sightings in Great Falls on or around November 16th 2009
Summary: a bright fluorescent orange light caught my eye south east of the rocky boy indian reservation
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my mother were driving up on three mile road, going to visist my brother. I was looking out the window toward the south east, and noticed a bright floresent light in the sky. there was flash, then the light ended up 3 to 4 miles from where its origanal position. Then there was 3 more flashes, then 2 orange lights appeered, along with one bright light desening from the clouds. Then they started to do manuvers that any aircraft that I seen can do. This went on for about 7 minutes. One of the light seemed to desend to a hill. And then there was one big flash, next thing they were gone. Also on the next night November 17th, 2009. At 7:45pm. mst. my next door neighbor also reported the same lights above the same area from the previos night. Same lights same manovers. I'm from the Rocky Boy's Indian Reservation. And I never seen that sort of manuvers from any air craft around this area. In GreatFalls Mt. we have the Melstrom Air force Base. And i never seen or heard of there air craft doing them kind of manovers.
